mapper.insert: insert into operative_complications( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, fat_liquefaction, septic_shock, hemorrhage, anastomotic_bleeding, abdominal_hemorrhage, bile_leakage, enterorrhea, pulmonary_infection, respiratory_failure, heart_failure, deep_venous_thrombosis, atelectasis, anastomotic_leakage, peritonitis, urinary_tract_infection, intestinal_obstruction, urinary_retention, gastrointestinal_bleeding, abdominal_infection, cardiovascular_and_cerebrovascular_accident, pulmonary_embolism, incision_infection, gastrointestinal_perforation, ascites, lymphatic_fistula, ketoacidosis, anastomotic_stenosis, renal_failure, systemic_multiple_organ_failure, liver_dysfunction, liver_failure, intraperitoneal_hemorrhage, pancreatitis, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{fatLiquefaction}, #{septicShock}, #{hemorrhage}, #{anastomoticBleeding}, #{abdominalHemorrhage}, #{bileLeakage}, #{enterorrhea}, #{pulmonaryInfection}, #{respiratoryFailure}, #{heartFailure}, #{deepVenousThrombosis}, #{atelectasis}, #{anastomoticLeakage}, #{peritonitis}, #{urinaryTractInfection}, #{intestinalObstruction}, #{urinaryRetention}, #{gastrointestinalBleeding}, #{abdominalInfection}, #{cardiovascularAndCerebrovascularAccident}, #{pulmonaryEmbolism}, #{incisionInfection}, #{gastrointestinalPerforation}, #{ascites}, #{lymphaticFistula}, #{ketoacidosis}, #{anastomoticStenosis}, #{renalFailure}, #{systemicMultipleOrganFailure}, #{liverDysfunction}, #{liverFailure}, #{intraperitonealHemorrhage}, #{pancreatitis}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update operative_complications set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv1 = #{uniqueIdLv1}, unique_id_lv2 = #{uniqueIdLv2}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, fat_liquefaction = #{fatLiquefaction}, septic_shock = #{septicShock}, hemorrhage = #{hemorrhage}, anastomotic_bleeding = #{anastomoticBleeding}, abdominal_hemorrhage = #{abdominalHemorrhage}, bile_leakage = #{bileLeakage}, enterorrhea = #{enterorrhea}, pulmonary_infection = #{pulmonaryInfection}, respiratory_failure = #{respiratoryFailure}, heart_failure = #{heartFailure}, deep_venous_thrombosis = #{deepVenousThrombosis}, atelectasis = #{atelectasis}, anastomotic_leakage = #{anastomoticLeakage}, peritonitis = #{peritonitis}, urinary_tract_infection = #{urinaryTractInfection}, intestinal_obstruction = #{intestinalObstruction}, urinary_retention = #{urinaryRetention}, gastrointestinal_bleeding = #{gastrointestinalBleeding}, abdominal_infection = #{abdominalInfection}, cardiovascular_and_cerebrovascular_accident = #{cardiovascularAndCerebrovascularAccident}, pulmonary_embolism = #{pulmonaryEmbolism}, incision_infection = #{incisionInfection}, gastrointestinal_perforation = #{gastrointestinalPerforation}, ascites = #{ascites}, lymphatic_fistula = #{lymphaticFistula}, ketoacidosis = #{ketoacidosis}, anastomotic_stenosis = #{anastomoticStenosis}, renal_failure = #{renalFailure}, systemic_multiple_organ_failure = #{systemicMultipleOrganFailure}, liver_dysfunction = #{liverDysfunction}, liver_failure = #{liverFailure}, intraperitoneal_hemorrhage = #{intraperitonealHemorrhage}, pancreatitis = #{pancreatitis}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
